alert.note: Alert for Bath (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 9:12PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Bath and Fleming Counties through 945 PM EST... At 912 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nepton to near Cowan to near Carlisle. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nepton and Elizaville around 915 PM EST. Flemingsburg, Pecks Ridge, Tilton and Craintown around 920 PM EST. Sherburne around 925 PM EST. Mount Carmel, Poplar Plains and Pebble around 930 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Goddard, Hillsboro, Foxport, Wallingford, Muses Mills and Plummers Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
